name: Dano Doms (Straw Hat Doms)
biography: I'm Doms, and I'm gonna be the King of the Pirates! Raised by his adventurous grandpa, Luffy gained the power of stretching rubber after accidentally eating a Devil Fruit. With his signature straw hat and a burning desire for freedom, Doms sets sail on the vast seas to assemble a crew, explore the world, and find the legendary treasure One Piece. Along the way, he faces powerful marines, notorious pirates, and challenging adventures, all while protecting his precious nakama (crew) and his unwavering dream.
motto: I will become the Pirate King!
